title.native: 遊☆戯☆王5D's（ファイブディーズ）

description: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's is set in Neo Domino City some time after the events concerning Yugi Mutou (DM) and Judai Yuki (GX). A new form of dueling, "Riding Duels", now take place on motorcycles called "D-Wheels". While regular dueling still exists, Riding Duels have become a popular form of entertainment for spectators, who watch them in specially-designed stadiums.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Prison
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Proxy Battle
tags.description: A proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode.

node.description:
The creator of Yu-Gi-Oh! He loved playing shogi, mahjong, card games, and tabletop role-playing games.

In an interview with Shonen Jump, Takahashi stated that his favorite manga from other authors included Akira by Katsuhiro Otomo, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki, and Dragon Ball by Akira Toriyama. He also enjoyed reading American comics, with Hellboy being his favorite American comic book character.

On July 6, 2022, a body in snorkeling gear was found off the coast of Nago City, Okinawa, which was identified the following day as Takahashi. It was revealed by a U.S. Army Officer that Takahashi attempted to aid in the rescue of three people at a riptide in Mermaid's Grotto, Onna, on July 4, 2022.

Alice Nine's musical style can mainly be described as J-Rock (Japanese Rock), differentiating between heavier songs and a more mainstream approach. In the past their music had a heavier sound as opposed to the sound of their new album, which contains a variation of lighter instruments and synthesizers. Like some other Visual Kei bands, as they progressed through the years, the band experimented and released songs that focus more on the mainstream public.  Shou on vocals Hiroto on guitars Tora on guitars Saga on bass Nao on drums

[Website](https://endoh-masaaki.com/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBnCeOigma9Cv6eI5_QleQQ) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/遠藤正明) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masaaki_Endoh)

Masaaki Endou is a Japanese singer-songwriter who is prominent in the area of soundtracks for anime and tokusatsu productions. He is one of the founders of the Anison band JAM Project and has been a regular member ever since its inception in 2000. His nickname is the "Young Lion of Anison" and he goes by the motto "Always Full Voice".

He is one of the founders of the Anison band JAM Project and has been a regular member ever since its inception in 2000. His nickname is the "Young Lion of Anison" and he goes by the motto "Always Full Voice".
Knotlamp (stylized KNOTLAMP) is a band formed in Fukuoka in the 2000.  Members: Keit - Vocal/Guitar Tohru - Bass Akihito - Drum Tetsunari - Guitar

vistlip formed on the auspicious date of July 7, 2007 with members from all over Japan: vocalist Tomo from Fukuoka, Kyushu, Tokyo-born guitarists Yuh and Umi, who also does rap vocals and is responsible for bringing the group together, bassist Rui from Hyogo and Kanagawa native Tohya on drums.

Started of with photography work, soon switched to directing.

name.native: プラスティック トゥリー

node.description: Ryutaro Arimura (vocals) Akira Nakayama (guitar) Tadashi Hasegawa (bass) KenKen Satou (drums)  Plastic Tree (プラスティック トゥリ) is a Japanese rock band which formed in December 1993 in Chiba Prefecture, Japan.They released their first mini-album in December 1995, and in 1997, they debuted by releasing their first single on a major label.
